title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete resemblance in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing similarity in a dream. Similarity is known as a semi-transparent white stone in the form of powder. It is known that similarity has many advantages. Therefore, seeing similarity in a dream comes to many people in a complete dream, so we have put for you, dear followers, all the correct and correct details. Senior scholars in the interpretation of dreams. Why do you dream of seeing a likeness? The interpretation of the similarities that we see in a dream explains that a lot of money comes to the dreamer in his life and may come from Christians. Seeing a complete hanging net in a dream indicates a dispute over worldly goods, and it is undesirable to see what looks like yellow. Also, seeing a manifestation of yellow in a dream is complete evidence that you have heard bad words and insults from enemies. Eating a likeness in a dream is one of the visions of kindness and great and wide support that the dreamer will enjoy in the next life. Complete alum in a dream Interpretation of seeing a similarity stone in a dream is a sign of lawful money, profits and great benefits that will pass to the dreamer. Buying a picture in a dream is complete evidence of the success of the project that the dreamer will present or a reward for his work. Selling a whole alum in a dream is desirable and said that the dreamer will achieve many desires and goals. Why dream half empty The alum in a dream is full, good and good, and evidence of the dreamer enjoying many benefits. Also, seeing the crackling of alum in a complete dream is a sign that the dreamer will feel the troubles and experiences that he will get rid of in His life. The young man in a dream is complete for a common woman. The interpretation of seeing a stone in a common woman's dream is desirable and indicates a great future, goodness, happiness and joy. A young woman's vision in a complete dream speaks of her imminent engagement and close marriage with a man who has a lot of money. Also, to see and polish a stone in a dream for a girl means the problems and difficulties that she will face in the coming life. Why dream of a young man? The interpretation of seeing a young man in a dream and its shape differs from the real one, indicating some problems that the dreamer faced in his life. Ibn Shaheen showed that seeing a young man in a dream means that the dreamer will have the opportunity to travel to foreign countries to earn a living and earn money. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of beating with a stick in a dream: I dreamed that someone was hitting me

preview.html: A vision of beating someone with a stick in a dream: beating someone with a stick in a dream is evidence that his sin will be alleviated in the near future. Beating a stick in a dream is evidence of the problems that the dreamer will suffer. Hitting a stone with a stick And water flowing from it in a dream is evidence of wealth in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a poor person hitting a stone in a dream and water coming out of it is evidence of wealth and semi-wealth. Relying on a stick in a dream is evidence that he is an honest person. A stick in a dream is evidence of problems that the dreamer will face. Interpretation of beating with a stick in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Beating with a stick is good for the one to whom the act occurred, as it is an expression of his livelihood and work, and even good luck and success in studying, and the more intense the beating, the greater the benefit and the more giving. Hitting a stick sometimes benefits travel if it is followed by fear or crying, and hitting a stick benefits wealth if there is an escape from behind. If a person dreams of hitting a stone with his stick, water flows from it, and if he is poor, he becomes rich, and if he is rich, he gets richer. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a stick by Ibn Sirin: If he dreams that he is hitting land with a stick in which there is a dispute between him and others, then he owns it and overturns his dispute. Interpretation of a dream about hitting Nabulsi with a stick: Whoever sees that he is hitting the ground with it, he will prevail over the owner of the place on which he stands, and whoever sees that he is hitting the ground Someone with a stick, then stretched out. His tongue is on him. If one dreams that he is hitting a stone with a stick, water will come out of it. It is made of wood, and wood is representation. Interpretation of dreams about hitting a stick by Ibn Shaheen: Whoever sees that he is hit with a stick, then extends his tongue to him; Because he, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said to Al-Fadl bin Abbas: (Do not raise it). The stick is against your family, i.e. your tongue). Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees herself being hit with a stick in a dream, then this vision may indicate many problems, worries, and sorrow, but if an unmarried woman sees herself being hit with a stick, then this vision may indicate Her wedding was delayed. Seeing a man hitting a stick may indicate a major loss in a project in which he will fail. He is exposed to difficult problems and crises that he faces in his life. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a stick for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees someone hitting her with a stick in her dream and feels severe pain and some wounds on her body, then this vision may indicate that she is exposed to worries, problems, and difficulties. And if she sees that she is hitting someone with a stick This vision can indicate kindness, livelihood, and a lot of money that will come to her through a project through which she will earn. Interpretation of beating in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees in a dream that she is hitting her young children with a stick, this vision may indicate many mistakes in The actions of her children. And if she sees her husband hitting her with a stick, this vision may indicate that there are marital disputes between her and her husband, but they will be resolved soon, while she sees many people hitting each other, and this vision may indicate a change in her. . To the best and the best. Interpretation of beating in a dream for a man: If a man sees in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating shrimp in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my husband eating shrimp in a dream, so you have to be careful and not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of my husband eating shrimp in a dream: In the event that one sees the husband eating shrimp in a dream, this can indicate material gains that the dreamer may acquire in those days, thanks to God. Dreaming that the husband is eating shrimp may indicate a wide diet and many goods that he obtains thanks to God. If the husband is eating shrimp in the dream, this may indicate a job opportunity that the wife can get in those days. When you see the husband eating shrimp In a dream, this may indicate the high status and positive changes that have occurred to him since that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating cooked meat in a dream: A dream about eating cooked meat for the husband in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband can obtain in those days. If You dreamed that your husband is eating cooked meat, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during this period. If you see yourself eating cooked meat in a dream, this may indicate halal money that the husband may earn during this period. In the event that you see your husband eating cooked meat In a dream, this may indicate the solution of a major problem that the dreamer was facing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the husband entering the mosque in a dream: A dream about a husband entering the mosque in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams. It is possible that he will see the husband entering the mosque at the height of the relationship that may You associate him with him during this period, and God knows best. In the event that the husband dreams of entering the mosque, this may indicate profits that the husband may gain and abundant money. In the event that you see the husband entering the mosque in a dream, this may indicate that desires and dreams will be satisfied to a large extent during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about kissing your mother-in-law’s hand in a dream: Kissing your husband’s mother-in-law’s hand in a dream may indicate the health and well-being that you enjoyed during that period. If a woman sees herself kissing her mother-in-law’s hand, this may indicate good things that will come her way in those days. It is possible that Seeing one’s mother being kissed in a dream indicates her good skin in those days, and God knows best. Seeing a woman kissing in a dream may indicate the happiness and family stability that they enjoyed at that time, and God knows best. A dream that shows a husband hitting his wife in a dream may indicate that he benefits greatly from her advice, and God knows best. Seeing a husband hitting his wife in a dream may be A sign of the joking and good relationship that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. title: Prayer in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single girl: If one sees prayer in the dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates that she will soon marry a good man, God willing. She also shows a lot of goodness if she sees herself praying in the mosque. And if she sees herself standing to pray and praying with women behind her This is considered evidence of her imminent marriage and her readiness for it. Her imminent marriage also appears if she sees herself praying on Friday. But seeing herself praying in a dream while praying for rain indicates the difficulty of her marriage, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream and its importance according to Nablus. Interpretation Watching prayer in a dream for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of praying is a sign of much goodness and blessing, God willing. If a married woman sees herself praying in a dream, this indicates her commitment to her life and religion. This vision shows her love for her husband and home, and takes into account the concerns of God Almighty. In everything and the happiness that she experiences. Seeing a married woman praying in a dream while she is afraid of something indicates that she is afraid of something in reality, and she must be reassured, and God knows best. A woman’s prayer in her sleep is due to her sober mind in determining the correct decisions and the stability of life in general. And her supplications To God in her sleep is evidence of the approaching appearance of goodness that is close to her, such as a pregnancy for her, even if she is barren, thanks to God Almighty. Her failure to complete her prayer in her dream is due to the presence of some problems that disturbed her life and ended soon. And the married man praying behind her in a dream is a sign that her end is approaching, and by God I know. A woman leading a man in a dream may indicate something she is doing in reality that is incorrect and should be abandoned. Praying in a dream is a good dream, and indicates a lot of goodness, and it is possible for the husband to gain a high position in his work. Seeing a married woman going to The mosque, with her ablution and prayer, symbolizes the forgiveness of her sins and transgressions and her closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a woman praying without a hijab in her sleep indicates that she is falling short of the right of Almighty God in worshiping and obeying Him. Seeing a woman praying without a hijab indicates her negligence in the affairs of her home, which has a great impact on On her family life. If a woman prays in her sleep without wearing a hijab, this indicates that she will face major problems with her husband that may lead to divorce. If this woman is a worker and sees herself praying without a hijab, it seems that she left her job as quickly as possible. Some interpreters believe Seeing a married woman praying without her hijab means many problems that will happen to her in her next life, and she must be careful. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing a man in a dream praying and wearing a white robe or reciting some verses of the Qur’an and facing the Qiblah. This indicates performing Hajj rituals. Soon, God willing. The man’s vision shows him praying with people behind him, and he was facing the Qiblah, to assume one of the important positions, and to be fair in his decisions. The man’s prayer in a dream in a dirty place may indicate that his desires and aspirations will not be fulfilled, and God knows best.

title: Seeing grilled fish in a dream

preview.html: Grilled fish in a dream Many people are exposed to seeing grilled fish in a dream, which makes them search for the meaning of this dream and its meaning, which varies according to the dreamer's condition. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say about seeing grilled fish in a dream, different interpretations, such as: Seeing fish or catching it on the grill indicates an improvement in conditions, freedom from problems and worries, and the end of crises. Seeing grilled fish indicates that God will answer prayers and that difficult matters in life will end. A person's vision of a number of baked fish indicates the number of spouses in the dreamer's life. As for seeing large numbers of grilled fish, this indicates a lot of good that will come to this person. Seeing grilled fish descending from the sky means that the dreamer will soon face health problems. Seeing grilled meat indicates visions, and the abundance of thorns indicates the dispute that may arise between him and his family. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating a dead fish, this is a sign of illness or frustration. Seeing fish from fresh water indicates a good and great benefit for the dreamer. If the dream contains fishing from dirty or turbid water, this indicates the presence of many worries and sorrows. If a married woman sees that she is taking a fish from someone, this means that she will become pregnant in the same year in which she dreamed of this dream. If a pregnant woman sees that there is a fish and sees that it comes out of her vagina, this indicates that she will give birth to a female. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing grilled fish in a dream has a connotation, either it symbolizes nutrition, goodness and money, or it symbolizes sadness and problems in life, and it depends on its shape and the taste of the fish. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing grilled fish as a sign of nutrition, improving conditions and abundance Food. As you say that seeing grilled fish in a dream is evidence of the good deeds that the dreamer has done recently. As for the one who sees that he loves to eat fish, this is evidence of comfort and reassurance and that life is free of problems. Ibn Sirin says that seeing salted grilled fish means frequent travel and benefiting from the travel of friends with knowledge and better thinking. Grilled fish in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted the vision of grilled fish in a dream with different interpretations, which are as follows: Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing fish in general indicates a good and adequate diet for the one who has a vision. He also said: Seeing grilled fish indicates an abundance of spoils, based on the Almighty’s saying: (And it is the sea from which you eat meat). He also said in his interpretation that seeing fish in a dream means that a person may face many problems, whether in his work from his boss or in life or from the ruler. He also mentioned that seeing a fish in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s desire to see the one she loves for a long time and waiting to see him, and the dream indicates that his desire will be fulfilled soon. As for if the dream is about an unmarried girl, this indicates that God She will be given a good husband and will have a peaceful life. Eating fish

title: A detailed interpretation of a race track in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a race track in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: (They said, dreams are heaped dreams). The fortuneteller, and in this article today in the encyclopedia that we present in these different interpretations, follow us. Interpretation of a race track in a dream If one sees a race in a dream, or a track in a dream, then this vision indicates the competitiveness of the person who has the vision. Seeing a battle and its track in a dream expresses Also about the dreamer's need to step back for a while before making the most important decisions or acting on the conflict. In case the person sees that he is winning the match. It symbolizes the abilities and qualifications that this person possesses, which he tries to use correctly to achieve all his goals and aspirations in the future. One of the interpretations of winning the race is that the fortuneteller will reach all his goals and dreams that he aspires to as quickly as possible. As for losing the match. It appears that the dreamer exaggerates his abilities and efforts and that he cannot achieve his goals in reality. Another interpretation of losing the race is that it expresses difficult ambitions and dreams that the dreamer seeks to achieve. Seeing the person participating in the match. It indicates the real competition that exists between that person and some of his competitors, and if you see a victory in the race, this is evidence of his victory over the competitors. Interpretation of Dreams of a Running Race Seeing a running race and its track in a dream indicates the great effort that this person makes to earn a living in life. If A person saw a running and track race in a dream without participating in the race. This vision symbolizes that this person must retract some of his decisions, and he must be careful when deciding his fate. And if you see a victory in a running race; It is an expression of this man's success in many aspects of his life. As for losing the running race; It expresses the viewer making many wrong decisions. Seeing a running race, and its track in general, symbolizes the amount of fear a person feels and that he is afraid of taking responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about winning a car race: seeing a person driving a racing car and its track. It represents the fast lifestyle of this person. Dream of a Single Running RaceIf a single girl dreams of a running race and its tracks. This dream expresses the marriage of this girl to the person she wants to marry. But if the single woman sees that she is walking on the path, behind someone she knows. This vision symbolizes the marriage of this girl to this person. If he sees her running after a predatory animal. This vision is an indication of this girl’s ability to realize and reach her dreams. Racing in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream struggle in all its types or effects. This vision is an indication of what this woman is afraid of and also shows her constant striving to achieve her goals. In the event that he sees that he has reached the end of the path. This vision shows that he will always be able to achieve everything he desires.If he saw that he was running fast on the track. This vision symbolizes the difficult qualities of this woman and her strength in overcoming them

title: Interpretation of death in a dream according to great interpreters

preview.html: Seeing death in a dreamSeeing death in a dream, when hearing the word death in real life, a person feels fear and tension, and also when seeing death in a dream, this dream causes anxiety and terror in the same dreamer and he desperately wants to know the interpretation of this vision. In this article, different people present the interpretation of death in a dream to leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and the meanings of dream symbols. Symbol of death in a dream The symbols and meanings of seeing death in a dream vary depending on the state of the dream and the things that appear in the dream. For example, when you see someone cutting off part of a person’s body Another, and this results in the death of the first person, this indicates the second’s hatred for the first. And when you see a living person and see him dead during a dream, this is interpreted as going through some difficult problems and crises. Whoever sees himself in a dream digging a dead person’s grave, this indicates the dreamer’s search for Knowledge.Seeing death in a dream, when the sleeper sees himself in the dream, dying and then living again, symbolizes committing some sins and disobeying the dreamer.If the sleeper sees that he is talking to the dead in his dream, this is interpreted by having his needs met.Seeing death in a dream without An illness foretells a long life for the dreamer. While seeing a dead person in a dream, and the dead person’s face is smiling and wearing green clothes, this indicates that the sins of that person will be forgiven. Seeing a person in a dream as if he will never die, interprets that he will achieve martyrdom or be killed for the sake of God Almighty. If Seeing death in a dream, seeing it washed and covered, and holding a funeral or mourning for it in a dream, indicates the corruption of the sleeper’s religion and his quest for this world. Whoever sees himself being killed, interprets peace of mind and health in the body. Seeing the death of the ruler in a dream interprets the destruction of the country. If he sees The sleeper in his dream is that he is immersed in water until his death, this indicates the death of the dreamer and he has many sins, and it can also be interpreted as his death as a witness. Seeing a person as if he were dead in bed, is interpreted by rising the situation. To see a dead person lying, means That you will find money. Seeing the death of a son means getting rid of enemies. But seeing the death of a daughter shows despair. Hearing the news of someone’s sudden death portends sadness and anxiety that will suddenly befall the viewer. If a pregnant woman sees herself dying in a dream while people carry her and cry over her without her crying or screaming, this portends the birth of a male child. As for a married man who He sees himself in a dream and is dying, this is interpreted by the shadow of his wife. Whoever was a partner in a trade or business with someone, and saw in his dream that he had died, then the dream symbolizes the dissolution of that partnership. Seeing the sleeper in his dream as if he were dead while alive means the traitor’s conversion At his hands or the repentance of the immoral person at his hands. Seeing the death of the ruler, people screaming at him, tearing their clothes, and wearing the abaya on their heads is evidence of the ruler’s oppression and wrongdoing. While seeing a dream about sleeping next to a dead person’s bed explains the dreamer’s long life, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of death in a dream for a single woman is: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of death in a dream for an unmarried girl, when she sees it and

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding a weapon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about finding a weapon in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about finding a weapon in a dream. It is one of the dreams that many people wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about finding a weapon in a dream It is possible that seeing finding a gun in a dream indicates the security that the dreamer may feel in those days, and God knows best. If one sees that he is taking a gun in a dream, this may indicate that he is a rational person who weighs things. If you see a gun in a dream, this may mean paying off debts and getting rid of the financial crises that the dreamer was facing in his life. The dream of finding a weapon in a dream may indicate the wisdom and strength of mind that the dreamer enjoys, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about finding a water well in a dream Seeing finding a water well in a dream may indicate the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time. Finding a water well in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer may acquire in his life during those days. If you see finding a water well in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed during his life during this period. If you see in a dream finding a water well, this may indicate some happy events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during those days, and God knows best. Seeing the finding of a lost shoe in a dream may indicate a long period that the dreamer may suffer from and that he will be freed from it by the grace of God. If you see a lost shoe in a dream and find it, this may indicate that dreams and aspirations have been largely achieved during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he found a shoe that he was losing, it may indicate that he will face some problems that he will be freed from in the coming days, by the grace of God. The dream of finding sunglasses in a dream may indicate protecting children from any problem they face outside the home. If one sees himself finding sunglasses in a dream, this may indicate hiding some secrets from his family, and God knows best. A person’s dream of finding the freshness of the sun may indicate that he personally does not like to deal with others, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about dough for a single woman and a married woman for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Contents: Cutting dough by hand Opening dough, flour, barley or wheat flour, eating dough, meat pies, dreamed of, kneading home-leavened dough, brown and white dough in a dream Seeing it indicates imminent rest and waiting for the release of a prisoner or a pregnant woman. Dough is the money that the dreamer gets. Whoever sees yeast in his house, he will benefit from the money in trade. If the yeast is sour and overflows, he will lose in trade. Whoever sees that he is kneading the traveler’s feet. If it ferments in a spacious place, he will get married, and God Almighty expands what is permissible and restricts what is forbidden. If you do not raise the dough, then it is corruption and financial hardship. And whoever sees in his dream that he is kneading barley flour, then he is trustworthy and will be tested with strength and will be victorious over enemies. Seeing dough in dreams indicates that prosperity is near and will not It lasts until the dreamer feels comfortable. The dough indicates comfort in a dream after hardship for a pregnant or imprisoned woman and symbolizes the acquisition of wealth. And whoever sees in his dream that the dough is in his house, this means that this person will win in his profession. And whoever saw in a dream that he was kneading barley flour, the interpretation scholars said about this dream. That its owner will be a person who believes in God and will attain a great position in his victory over his opponent. Whoever sees in his dream that he was fermenting in a large, vast place, this symbolizes that this person will get married. The dough in the dream symbolizes the nearness of comfort for the dreamer after many difficulties that he faced on his way, and it can To be good news and relief for those who are suffering. Whoever sees dough in her dream, and is married and does not have children, symbolizes relief after a long wait, and she will be happy that she will become pregnant. Whoever sees white dough in a dream, this is a sign of material gain and halal money that she will obtain. Who is dreaming That the dough in her house is spoiled and unleavened is a sign of the loss that her family will suffer, especially if her husband works in the field of trade. If you dream that you are kneading, this indicates the return of a close relative from a trip. And if you see that you are kneading a large portion, this indicates a close marriage. If you dream that you are kneading barley flour, this is a sign of the strength of faith and you will be able to defeat your enemies. If you see in your dream that the dough is placed in a bowl, this means that what you have in mind can be verified . If the dough breaks the fast, this indicates that the matter will be achieved, but slowly. And if you see that the dough is being baked, it means that what you wish for will actually come true. The appearance of fresh bread in your dream in sufficient quantity symbolizes your desire to fulfill material desires. Tasting bad bread in a dream symbolizes your hesitation or a wrong decision you have made. Seeing a loaf of bread in a dream symbolizes coexistence. Humanity and friendship. It is the force that nourishes the soul and body. If you see it in a dream, it means that you are developing on a spiritual and personal level within the society in which you live. Its large size symbolizes prosperity and success. Asking for bread symbolizes humility. Hard bread announces that you will face a difficult situation and find Soon you are facing a big problem.If you see that someone is eating another bread and he is hungry, it means that this person you saw is feeling
